price: 152 qui répandent le mal sur terre sans accomplir aucun bien. »
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
